title: Backrooms Escape Together Directly Download
description:
As a team of researchers, you are sent into the Backrooms to gather more info on the liminal labyrinth. However, after completing your research duties, an elevator malfunction sends you plummeting into the heart of the most dangerous levels, leaving you with the only objective of escape and survival. Currently, Level 0 is the only playable level. Being an introduction, your team is tasked with various research objectives.
These can include recording entities and landmarks, gathering data on the backrooms, and collecting VHS tapes for evidence Built in Unreal Engine 5, Backrooms : Escape Together will be the first to truly capture the essence of the Backrooms. Bendy and the Dark Revival
Levels will be procedurally generated, dynamically lit with stunning quality, and packed with detail. Levels will be added constantly through early access as we grow the game into the true Backrooms experience. Next-gen graphics, procedurally generated levels, handcrafted sound, and gameplay built to immerse the player will make you feel as if you are really a lost wander, stuck in the Backrooms.

game_info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
